name: okc ruby
blurb: OKC Ruby is focused on helping Oklahoma Rubyists to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: okc js
blurb: OKC js is focused on helping Oklahoma Javascripters to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: cocoaheads okc
blurb: Oklahoma City’s local Cocoaheads group devoted to the discussion of iOS and Mac programming.

name: okc sql
blurb: OKC SQL is focused on helping Oklahoma to connect, query, and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: ok gd
blurb: OK GD is focused on helping Oklahoma Game Developers to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: okc jug
blurb: OKC Jug is focused on helping Oklahoma Java Devs to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: oklahoma php
blurb: Oklahoma PHP is focused on helping Oklahoma PHP devs to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: okc2600
blurb: All kinds of hackers are welcome to 2600 meetings, regardless of whether you are a seasoned expert or a complete n00b.

name: OKC LUGnuts
blurb: OKC LUGnuts is a Linux user group that tries to cater to both beginner desktop users and guru sysadmins alike.

name: ISSA-OKC
blurb: ISSA-OKC is the OKC chapter of the Information Systems Security Association.

name: The Irregulars
blurb: The Irregulars are an ethical hacker group of like minded students and professionals. Also, we host an annual conference called Root-66.

name: OKC Python
blurb: OKC python is focused on helping Oklahoma Pythonistas to connect and share ideas. We hope you will join us.

name: Tulsa Web Devs
blurb: Tulsa Web Devs are on a mission to make Tulsa one of the best cities in the world for web developers.

name: Code for Tulsa
blurb: We are a Code for America brigade improving Tulsa - one commit at a time.

name: OKC MySQL
blurb: okcmysql.org is an open forum through which users of the MySQL (and related) database can collaborate to grow the local ecosystem

name: Code Norman
blurb: This group is for people who like to code, who like to talk about code, or cannot seem to stop thinking about computers.

name: Code for OKC
blurb: Code for OKC is a Code for America Brigade helping innovate government and make OKC better using the open web.

name: Refresh OKC
blurb: Where we strive to bring news & knowledge of today’s most exciting trends and information in the field of Web Design.
